alert.note: Alert for Clarke (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 26 at 6:09AM CDT until March 26 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 AM CDT FOR CLARKE COUNTY... At 608 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near De Soto, or near Quitman, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Sykes around 625 AM CDT. Crandall around 630 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Pachuta and Shubuta. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
